metadata.title: CVE-2024-26825 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:nci: free rx_data_reassembly skb on NCI device cleanup rx_data_reassemblyskb is stored during NCI data exchange for processing fragmented packets.It is dropped only when the last fragment is processed or when an NTFpacket with NCI_OP_RF_DEACTIVATE_NTF opcode is received. However, the NCIdevice may be deallocated before that which leads to skb leak. As by designthe rx_data_reassembly skb is bound to the NCI device and nothing preventsthe device to be freed before the skb is processed in some way and cleaned,free it on the NCI device cleanup. Found by Linux Verification Center(linuxtesting.org) with Syzkaller.
